original_text: Existing fields using `camelCase` will remain available for a transitional period but are officially deprecated and will be removed by **2025-10-01**.
units: Existing fields using ` camelCase ` will remain available for a transitional period but are officially deprecated and will be removed by * * 2025 - 10 - 01 * * .
are officially deprecated and will be removed by * * 2025 - 10 - 01 * *
